ygData.subject: Re: attn: john kim (jig Vs mana regen)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Who can keep up with the myths surrounding this song? :) If that s the case, then meditate away during the tests.  Just be aware of the randomness. Better
ygData.messageBody:
> >
> > I would suggest NOT meditating for these tests, unless there is the possibility that jig only
> > affects mana regen while meditating. Meditation adds a large random element to mana
>
> The song is purported to have an effect on meditation rate.
> Has a myth now been started that it increases your
> non-meditating mana regeneration rate?

Who can keep up with the myths surrounding this song? :)

If that's the case, then meditate away during the tests. Just be aware of the randomness.

Better yet, tell people that it's all a myth and if they don't believe you, too bad. :)

Jyzan
